abstract.p: Entergy Corp names J Walter Thompson to handle its advertising account, which had been at varous local agencies; Florida Power Corp names West Wayne Inc to handle its account, which had been at Lipphardt Advertising (S)

block.p: Two power companies have named agencies to handle their accounts, with combined billings estimated at more than $15 million.

The Entergy Corporation in New Orleans named J. Walter Thompson Atlanta to handle its account, which had been at various local agencies. Billings were estimated at more than $8.5 million. The decision came after a review that began with 20 agencies and had been narrowed to Thompson Atlanta, a unit of WPP Group, and 2 other finalists: Campbell Mithun Esty in Minneapolis, owned by top managers and the Interpublic Group of Companies, and Temerlin McClain in Dallas, part of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt.
Two power companies have named agencies to handle their accounts, with combined billings estimated at more than $15 million.

The Entergy Corporation in New Orleans named J. Walter Thompson Atlanta to handle its account, which had been at various local agencies. Billings were estimated at more than $8.5 million. The decision came after a review that began with 20 agencies and had been narrowed to Thompson Atlanta, a unit of WPP Group, and 2 other finalists: Campbell Mithun Esty in Minneapolis, owned by top managers and the Interpublic Group of Companies, and Temerlin McClain in Dallas, part of Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt.

And the Florida Power Corporation in St. Petersburg, Fla., named the Tampa office of West Wayne Inc. to handle its account, which had been at Lipphardt Advertising in Tampa for six years. The decision came after a monthlong review that also included three other finalists whose identities were not disclosed.
